style: Mythic surreal cinema, 35mm film emulation, radiant halation, pearlescent bloom, fine grain, celestial color grade
scene: A sacred shoreline where pastel pink and teal clouds form cathedral arches; a glowing ribbon of musical notes spirals like a halo; a bicycle crowned with pom-poms rests on wet sand; a vintage cassette altar glows; a lone figure faces a luminous sea; distant ship like a relic

cinematography.lighting: Heavenly backlight through clouds, soft sand bounce

background_sound: Ocean hush, airy chimes, distant wind
